about_the_game:
The soundtrack for Going Nowhere: The Dream! There are 12 tracks in 128kbps MP3 format.

Going Nowhere: The Dream

  • Bad Day
  • Citate the Past
  • Dog E's Theme
  • Falacy of Dreams
  • Going Awry
  • Haylee's Theme
  • Life's Just a Game
  • Our Distance
  • Something You Wont See
  • Citate the Past (Heavy) - Bonus Track
  • Alone on the Rooftops - Bonus Track
  • Pain - Bonus Track
